articles.title: 2 dead after Amazon warehouse collapse
articles.description: Two people are dead after a wall collapsed at an Amazon warehouse in Baltimore. The deadly collapse occurred as severe storms hit the area. CBS Baltimore's Ron Matz reports.

articles.title: Google employees stage protest over company's handling of sexual assault allegations
articles.description: Thousands of Google employees from around the world staged a walkout protest the company's handling of sexual misconduct claims. Jamie Yuccas reports.

articles.description: President Trump suggested at a rally in Montana that the women who had accused now-Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh of sexual misconduct were lying.

articles.title: 2 dead, 5 injured after gunman opens fire at Florida yoga studio
articles.description: A gunman opened fire inside a yoga studio in Florida, killing two and injuring five others. People inside the studio fought off the gunman, who police said shot and killed himself.

articles.description: Twitter has deleted thousands of automated accounts that tried to discourage users from voting in the upcoming midterm elections, the company said Friday.
